name: Bomber Barn (itch)
description:
Welcome!

Bomber Barn an explosive, local multiplayer arena game featuring cuddly animals bombing each other across a broad range of unique battlefields.

Each animal has its own special abilities and limitations, allowing for a variety of tactics and play styles. 

Catering to both casual and competitive crowds, Bomber Barn adds a modern twist to an old classic. Victory will require not only fast reflexes, but also deliberate movement and impeccable timing!

Features
  • 4 playable characters, with unique passive and active abilities
  • 3 classic types of power-ups to give you a leg up
  • 7 distinct maps, carefully designed for tense battles
  • 8 mix-ins you can combine to spice up the rules
  • Local multiplayer (1-4 players, including bots) with full controller support
  • Ongoing development, meaning more to come of all of the above!

Right now you can play the demo for free with all 4 main characters, 3 different maps, and 2 mix-ins (ruleset variants that you can combine to customize your match).

More is in store, so follow us on here, Steam, and on social media!
